The Best New Mixes Streaming Right Now

posted by Pigeons on December 7, 2014 in Audio
1

PreviousShift + ← / NextShift + →

By Moses Wiener

As the year comes to a close, there is no shortage of retrospective lists to remind you of the highlights from the past 12 months. Whether it be a list of box office blockbusters, a rundown of the year's top single releases or the year's best live performances. But for now, we're only concerning ourselves with the best mixes from the last two weeks; the general aim with all of these lists being to save you some time, presenting a carefully curated list of cool cats for your consideration, including one, two, or maybe more suggestions that might have slipped by you the first time.

For the latest installment of our series which documents mixes from a range of innovators in music today, we've got an ambient, four-way soundtrack from Jamie xx, Four Tet, Koreless & John Talabot, we've got a live recorded broadcast from London-based grime legend DJ Slimzee, we've got Jackmaster's masterful Mastermix, and much more. Check it out.

Click to start the list
